name: TIM CMS
description: This app is the CMS part of TIM - The Infos Machine

scripts.postdeploy: python app/manage.py migrate && echo "from django.contrib.auth.models import User; User.objects.create_superuser('${ADMIN_USER}', '${ADMIN_EMAIL}', '${ADMIN_PASSWORD}')" | python app/manage.py shell

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

BOT_SERVICE_ENDPOINT_FB.description: URL to the AWS Lambda service endpoint of the 'wdraktuell-bot-fb' cloud formation

BOT_SERVICE_ENDPOINT_TG.description: URL to the AWS Lambda service endpoint of the 'wdraktuell-bot-fb' cloud formation

AMP_SERVICE_ENDPOINT.description: URL to the AWS Lambda service endpoint of the 'informant-amp' cloud formation
